Apache httpd 2.4 and PHP 7 in macOShttps://htr3n.github.io/2017/09/apache-httpd-php-macos/Mon, 25 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2017/09/apache-httpd-php-macos/Together, Apache HTTP server, PHP, and MySQL form a powerful and popular combination for Web development. MacOS are often shipped with pre-installed versions of Apache HTTP server and PHP but these are often outdated and merely customised for macOS.
